Package eu.fbk.st.cryptoac.tuple

Class PermissionTuple

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.fbk.st.cryptoac.tuple.CryptoACTuple
      • eu.fbk.st.cryptoac.tuple.PermissionTuple
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class PermissionTuple
extends CryptoACTuple
implements java.io.Serializable
    This tuple binds a Role and a File over a Permission. Thus, it allows users belonging to the Role to read or write the file. The assocaited element is the Role, while the specific element is the File.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • PermissionTuple

        public PermissionTuple​(java.lang.String associatedElement,
                       int roleVersionNumber,
                       java.lang.String associatedFile,
                       Permission associatedPermission,
                       int fileVersionNumber,
                       byte[] encryptedSymmetricFileKey)
        Parameters:
        associatedElement - the element associated (a Role Id)
        roleVersionNumber - the role version number. A negative or zero value will be set to 1 by default
        associatedFile - the associated file ID
        associatedPermission - the permission being granted to the role over the specified file
        fileVersionNumber - the file version number. A negative or zero value will be set to 1 by default
        encryptedSymmetricFileKey - the encrypted symmetric key for accessing the file encrypted with the public key of the role
